info.description:
Ads a shape layer the size of the current comp.
Like adding a solid, but without creating a new solid
The colour of the shape is set randomly.
add a null as parent to all unparented layers, at the average position of them all

add a null as parent to all unparented layers
The new null will be at [0,0]
Adds an expression to layers that scale it to fill the current 3D camera
Adds a solid layer and makes it a track matte of the current layer
Adds a wiggle expression to the selected property and sets up sliders for amplitude and frequency.
Aligns the in and out point of child layers to match their parent layers
info.shortName: Align Childrens In And Out Points To Parents

info.description: Aligns the start time of child layers to their parents' start time
info.shortName: Align Childrens Start Time To Parents

info.description: moves all selected Keyframes to the current comp time
info.shortName: Align Selected KFs To Current Time

info.description: Aligns layers' source start time, independant of their in and out points
Centers a child layer on its parent
Same as collect files from the Dependencies menu, but keeps the folder structure of source items
Adds a keyframe to the selected property so that it continues at the same speed as it is moving at the last keyframe, until the end of the current comp.
Removes all expressions that are causing errors

Adds keyFrames to properties at the start and end of the composition, so that the property will continue moving at the same speed as is going before the first and after the last keyframes. Like loopIn and loopOut, but without expressions
Fits all layers in a comp to the comp height
info.shortName: Fit All Layers To Comp Height

info.description: Fits all layers in a comp to the comp width
info.shortName: Fit All Layers To Comp Width

info.description: Hides all layers marked as guide layers
If you have set a comp as the Main Comp for a project using the setMainComp script, this will jump to it, without having to use tab or find it in the project panel

set the label of all items that are portrait aspect (taller than wide) to label 12 (brown by default) and all landscape (wider than tall) items to purple.
If items are selected it will only apply to them, if no items are selected it will apply to all project items

Set the label of all unused items to <no label>.
If any project items are selected it will only apply to them, if no items are selected it will apply to all project items.
Adds a camera to a light so that you can 'look' through the light to see where it is aiming
Locks all shy layers in a comp.
Moves the anchor point of a layer to the middle of a comp - only affecting the x and y axis. I don't remember what this was for.
info.shortName: Move Anchor Pt To Middle Of Comp-XY_Only

info.description: Moves the anchor point of a layer to the middle of the comp.
info.shortName: Move Anchor Pt To Middle Of Comp

info.description:
If multiple layers are selected creates a null that acts as the parent for all selected layers
If one layer is selected makes that the parent for the everything in the comp\nIf nothing is selected, makes a new null the parent of everything in the comp
Deletes any effects that have been disabled
Removes keys from selected properties after the playhead, or before the playhead if the SHIFT key is held down
Removes all the comp markers
Removes a gap in the comp (area where no layers are active) wherever the playhead is parked. Ripples all later layers up.
Removes all keyframes from properties that only have a single key, turning off animation for those properties.
info.shortName: Remove Single Key Frames From Properties

info.description:
Enables you to split the current comp into sections when rendering.
Multiple copies of the comp will be added to the render queue, split ito sections at each comp marker. Each section will render to a sequentially named file.
Resizes solids that are matte layers to fit their target layers
Fits 3D layers to fit the current camera's view

If SHIFT is held down, selects all keys on all layers before the current time
If ALT/OPT is held down, selects all keys on all layers after the current time.
If no keys held down selects all keys that happen during the current frame.
info.shortName: Select Key Frames Before / At / After CurrentTime

info.description:
If SHIFT is held down, selects all layers that start and end before the current time
If ALT/OPT is held down, selects all layers that start after the current time.
If no keys held down selects all keys that are active at the current time.
info.shortName: Select All Layers Before / At / After Playhead

info.description: The inverse of the select children function. Selects all parents and parent's parents of the selected layers

this script will take the selected group of layers and from them create an animatable spine; each vertebra is parented to the one below it, and each vertebra above the lowermost (base) vertebra has an expression that is linked to the base vertebra's x rotation.
Selects the children of the current layer, but not their children

Selects the layer that is at the top of a parent hierarchy for the current layer. So if the current layer has a parent, which itself has a parent, which itself has a parent, the great-grandparent layer will be selected.
Select all layers without a parent. Aww. Sad.
Select all layers with the same parent as the current layer
When easy ease just isn't eased enough. This turns the easing on the selected keyframes up to 11. Or, actually 100%, since AE is afraid to turn it up to 11. ☠☢↯†☭‼ WEAK!
Use in conjunction with the Jump to Main Comp script. This sets the current comp as the project's Main Comp, to allow you to do one click jumps to it
Show any guide layers that are hidden
Randomly set the order of selected layers in the layer stack
Set any locked layers to shy, so they can be hidden in the timeline window

name: Sort Layers by In or Out Point.jsx

info.description: Sorts the layers of a comp by their in-point, or if CTRL key is pressed, by their out-point. To sort in descending order hold the SHIFT key
info.shortName: Sort Layers by In or Out Point

info.description:
Trims off the start and end of layers that fade up from 0% opacity, or fade down to 0% opacity.
Hold shift to apply to locked layers as well.

Trims the start and end of selected layers to match the layer below, and sets it as the alpha matte for the layer below.
Hold SHIFT to set as alpha inverted,
Hold ALT to set as luma,
and SHIFT+ALT to set as luma inverted
info.shortName: Trim To Layer Below And Set As Alpha Matte

info.description: Reverses the precompose function. Layers from a selected precomposition will be brought into the main comp
Unparents the selected layer with the transforms they got from their parents baked-in
